headline: VeriSign (VRSN) Announces Resignation of Long-Standing Board Member Thomas Frist
summary: VeriSign Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSN) is one of the 11 best performing Warren Buffett stocks in 2025. On June 12, the company made public the resignation of a long-standing member from its Board of Directors. Thomas F. Frist, III, exited the Board effective June 10, 2025. First, who had dedicated a decade to VeriSign’s Board, cited increasing […]
